message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $150. I think it will really benefit you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still not sure if I can go up to $130. How about we meet at $100? I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
